actions: Disperses Accumulation and stagnant Blood, resolves Phlegm, promotes diuresis, softens hardness and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, resolves toxicity, alleviates pain, dissipates nodules and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Purges accumulations, guides out Stagnation, softens hardness, moistens Dryness, clears Heat, drains Fire and reduces swelling.
Promotes movement of Qi, alleviates pain, descends Qi, regulates the Middle, dispels Cold, warms the Spleen and Stomach, stops vomiting and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Inhibits the growth of cancer cell
syndromes: Toxic Heat with Blood and Phlegm Stagnation

symptoms: The sputum is difficult to expectorate
The sputum rattles in the throat
Vomiting of saliva and undigested food
Loss of appetite, especially for meat
A rancid taste in the mouth
manifestations.pulse: Weak and choppy or Slippery or Slippery and large

notes: Grind the ingredients into a fine powder. Take 1g sublingually 4-6 times a day.
